amendment.description: To require a report on veterans who would have been reported to the national instant criminal background check system and who die by suicide with a firearm.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3447 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 473.

action.text: Amendment SA 3447 proposed by Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3447 proposed by Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 3411.
